trans-unit.source: When you play CARDNAME, choose a color and a creature type.\no5, oc\nT: Put a token creature into play. Treat this token as a 2/2 creature of the chosen color and creature type.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用CARDNAME时，选择一个颜色及生物种类。\no5，ocT：放置一个衍生物进场。将此衍生物视为具有该选定颜色及种类的2/2生物。
